Search results

curves->shape-ids

Create a repeating shapes list corresponding to a specific shape type. Looks shape s up in ENV-SHAPES if it's a keyword. If not, it assumes the val represents the bespoke curve vals for a generic curve shape (shape type 5). the bespoke curve vals aren't used here, but are picked up in curve-value. Mirrors *shapeNumber in supercollider/SCClassLibrary/Common/Audio/Env.sc

File: overtone/sc/envelope.clj Line: 48 

      (defn- curves->shape-ids
  "Create a repeating shapes list corresponding to a specific shape type.
  Looks shape s up in ENV-SHAPES if it's a keyword. If not, it assumes the
  val represents the bespoke curve vals for a generic curve shape (shape
  type 5). the bespoke curve vals aren't used here, but are picked up in
  curve-value.
  Mirrors *shapeNumber in supercollider/SCClassLibrary/Common/Audio/Env.sc"
  [curves]
  (cycle (map curve->shape-id curves)))
